text.config.lootbagmod.title: Loot Bag Mod
text.config.lootbagmod.option.StackSize: Maximum possible stack size for dropped items
text.config.lootbagmod.option.Drops: How many items drop when a loot bag is used
text.config.lootbagmod.option.EnableWhit: Use Whitelist (if enabled only items from lists below are dropped; otherwise all items except them)
text.config.lootbagmod.option.BlackList: BlackList (Syntax "minecraft or modid : item or block name"; example "minecraft:air" or "lootbagmod:lootbag")
text.config.lootbagmod.option.WhiteList: WhiteList Syntax "minecraft or modid : item or block name"; example minecraft:air or lootbagmod:lootbag)
text.config.lootbagmod.option.ChestDrops: Loot Bags spawns in treasure chests
text.config.lootbagmod.option.ChestsList: List of chests in which Loot Bag can spawn (Syntax "minecraft or modid : chests / chest id; example "minecraft:chests/jungle_temple"
text.config.lootbagmod.option.MobDrops: Loot Bags drops from killed mobs
text.config.lootbagmod.option.DropChance: Loot Bag drop chance from mobs (the higher the number the more common they are)
text.config.lootbagmod.option.AllHostile: Make Loot Bags droppable from all hostile Mobs
text.config.lootbagmod.option.AllNonHost: Make Loot Bags droppable from all passive and neutral mobs
text.config.lootbagmod.option.MobList: Mob drops list (Syntax " minecraft or modname : mobregistryname ")
